snippet: The two-time Indianapolis 500 winner Al Unser Jr. pleaded guilty to driving while intoxicated and racing on a New Mexico freeway.
lead_paragraph: The two-time Indianapolis 500 winner Al Unser Jr. pleaded guilty to driving while intoxicated and racing on a New Mexico freeway.

headline.seo: Al Unser Jr. Pleads Guilty to Driving While Intoxicated
